means: [人名] [爱尔兰姓氏] 迪莱 Dunleavy的变体

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词或短语动词均有"推延，延期"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: delay, postpone, defer, suspend, prolong, put off
means: delay ： 普通用词，多指因外界原因推迟或耽误，也可指有意推迟。
postpone ： 正式用词，语气较强，多指有安排的延期，常指明延期到一定的时间。
defer ： 正式用词，语气强于postpone，多指故意拖延。
suspend ： 指暂时中断以待某种条件的实现。
prolong ： 指把时间延长至超过正常或通常的限度。
put off ： 口语用词，与postpone同义，但较通俗。

sentence.Network_cn: 他讨厌任何形式的拖延和耽搁。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French delayer (verb)

encyclopedia.content: 函数名： delay 功 能： 将程序的执行暂停一段时间锛埡撩腼級 （该函数是TC下特有的函数，VC下应使用Sleep()函数） 用 法： void delay(unsigned milliseconds); 程序例： /* Emits a 440-Hz tone for 500 milliseconds */ #include<dos.h> int main(void) { sound(440); delay(500); nosound(); return 0; }

entry.def: If you delay doing something, you do not do it immediately or at the planned or expected time, but you leave it until later.

example.ex: For sentimental reasons I wanted to delay my departure until June...
example.tran: 因为感情方面的原因，我想把离开的日期延迟至6月。

example.ex: They had delayed having children, for the usual reason, to establish their careers...
example.tran: 为了那个通常的原因——创立自己的事业，他们推迟了要孩子。

entry.def: To delay someone or something means to make them late or to slow them down.

example.ex: Can you delay him in some way?...
example.tran: 你能想办法拖住他一会儿吗？

example.ex: Various setbacks and problems delayed production...
example.tran: 各种各样的挫折和问题耽搁了生产进度。

entry.def: If you delay, you deliberately take longer than necessary to do something.

example.ex: If he delayed any longer, the sun would be up.
example.tran: 如果他再拖延，太阳就要出来了。

entry.def: If there is a delay, something does not happen until later than planned or expected.

example.ex: They claimed that such a delay wouldn't hurt anyone...
example.tran: 他们声称这样的延期对谁都不会造成损害。

example.ex: Although the tests have caused some delay, flights should be back to normal this morning.
example.tran: 虽然检测造成了一定的延迟，不过今天早上航班就应该能恢复正常了。

entry.def: Delay is a failure to do something immediately or in the required or usual time.

example.ex: There is no time left for delay...
example.tran: 已经没有时间再耽误了。

example.ex: We'll send you a quote without delay.
example.tran: 我们会立刻送一份报价给你。

means.word_mean: 1. time during which some action is awaited;

sentences.sentence: "instant replay caused too long a delay"
"he ordered a hold in the action"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of delaying; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time
1. cause to be slowed down or delayed;

sentences.sentence: "Traffic was delayed by the bad weather"
"she delayed the work that she didn't want to perform"

means.word_mean: 2. act later than planned, scheduled, or required;

sentences.sentence: "Don't delay your application to graduate school or else it won't be considered"

means.word_mean: 4. slow the growth or development of;

sentences.sentence: "The brain damage will retard the child's language development"

auth_sentence.content: Every week of delay will risk scores of lives.
auth_sentence.res_content: Every week of delay will risk scores of lives.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Every week of delay will risk scores of lives.

auth_sentence.content: They were to ensnare and delay the German forces.
auth_sentence.res_content: They were to ensnare and delay the German forces.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They were to ensnare and delay the German forces.

auth_sentence.content: Delay in speech and language development is very common.
auth_sentence.res_content: Delay in speech and language development is very common.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Delay in speech and language development is very common.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 耽搁, 延迟, 迟滞
stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+lay拖延→v.耽搁, 延迟, 延期, 迟滞n.耽搁, 延迟, 迟滞

stems_affixes.value_cn: 耽搁, 延迟, 延期, 迟滞
stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+lay拖延→v.耽搁, 延迟, 延期, 迟滞n.耽搁, 延迟, 迟滞

Sentence.sentence: Unfortunately, it's been delayed due to the bad weather.
With far less controversy, colleges could send messages about canceled classes, delayed buses, campus crises or just the cafeteria menu.
It's the message you sent me about the delivery delay of the control desks.
I only heard about the delay yesterday because we kept the production line clear to handle these special sheets

sentences.en: His delay made the teacher angry.
sentences.cn: 他的迟到使老师生气了。

means.word_mean: 被耽搁[推迟]的事件或时间

sentences.en: My delay in going abroad is due to my illness.
sentences.cn: 我推迟出国是因为我生病了。

sentences.en: It is getting late, don't delay.
sentences.cn: 时间已晚, 不要耽搁了。
繁忙的交通把我们耽误了。

means.word_mean: 推迟，使延迟，使延期，延缓

sentences.en: The driver delayed the drive until the weather cleared.
sentences.cn: 驾驶员延迟到天气转晴后才出车。

jushi.english: Realizing the urgency of the matter, he dared not delay.
jushi.chinese: 他认识到事情紧急,不敢耽搁。

jushi.english: To delay would make the cure much more difficult.
jushi.chinese: 拖延就会给治疗增加困难。

jushi.english: Don't delay.The bell is going to ring.Please turn in your paper immediately.
jushi.chinese: 别拖延了,铃就要响了,马卷上交吧。
